#########################################################################
model{
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		y[i] ~ dweib(alphaY,bY)
	}
	# Aprioris SO2
	alphaY ~  dunif(0,10)
	bY ~ dunif(0,10)
	# Estimaciones derivadas
	kY <- pow(bY, -1/alphaY)
}

data
list(y=c(441, 271, 451, 532, 460, 394, 295, 98, 166, 402, 704, 687, 452, 697, 716, 851, 429, 327, 281, 259, 255, 518, 415, 409, 694, 848, 1023, 899, 339, 276, 457, 371, 456, 367, 464, 973, 420, 708, 973, 996, 811, 495, 301, 204, 459, 231, 221, 297, 607, 381, 567, 532, 679, 424, 297, 194, 189, 268, 478, 372, 977, 918, 520, 837, 456, 218, 523, 206, 234, 250, 267, 563, 277, 508, 408, 484, 297, 280, 254, 219, 131, 273, 304, 247, 261, 387, 535, 335, 448, 363, 171, 277, 183, 228, 227, 459, 719, 744, 350, 299, 522, 350, 418, 280, 256, 188, 307, 359, 257, 763, 484, 337, 318, 209, 313, 209, 208, 238, 253, 346, 315, 298, 323, 288, 383, 236, 147, 159, 182, 168, 296, 357, 518, 561, 618, 649, 210, 221, 141, 189, 127, 149, 167, 213, 295, 206, 204, 188, 228, 241, 174, 175, 176, 244, 218, 496, 472, 229, 332, 697, 397, 278, 138, 148, 131, 130, 248, 397, 513, 454, 364, 408, 929, 493, 173, 119, 134, 298, 183, 198, 189, 136, 288, 277, 397, 245, 139, 159, 188, 391, 312, 830, 546, 238, 505, 319, 249, 242, 114, 164, 191, 152, 172, 245, 247, 150, 512, 245, 544, 245, 110, 166, 111, 205, 297, 308, 347, 278, 539, 369, 401, 217, 289, 181, 124, 283, 163, 225, 306, 260, 394, 306, 268, 130, 107, 157, 128, 185, 186, 228, 238, 256, 301, 224, 245, 190, 187, 163, 122, 204, 187, 227, 236, 376, 179, 283, 400, 141, 116, 151, 148, 171, 216, 221, 247, 330, 255, 417, 448, 257, 175, 175, 183, 203, 262, 281, 354, 175, 328, 263, 131, 98, 148, 139, 232, 128, 218, 291, 294, 236, 258, 266, 441, 137, 97, 116, 118, 101, 182, 249, 210, 266, 267, 519, 254, 76, 88, 84, 108, 156, 202, 219, 323, 233, 825, 253, 175, 135, 90, 89, 135, 159, 264, 252), N=324)
